ErrorInformation.URLError: 文件路径不正确或文件无效
ErrorInformation.Error_InvalidFileName: 文件名不符合Windows命名规则，请重新输入！
ErrorInformation.Error_FileNameLength: 文件名长度超出范围(25个字符以内).
ErrorInformation.Error_InvalidNumber: 数据无效，请输入正确格式的数字0x(00-FF)
ErrorInformation.Error_KeyErr: 秘钥转换出错，请重新输入！
ErrorInformation.Error_OTPErr: OTP起始地址出错！应从块起始地址开始写入。

WarningInformation.CancelMCUEncryption: 如果取消MCU芯片加密，可能导致文件从MCU Flash中被获取，是否继续取消MCU芯片加密？
WarningInformation.Hint_Customized: 请输入定制化参数,参数之间以分号 ; 隔开
WarningInformation.Warn_Customized: 请输入：地址;步长;初始滚码值,以分号 ; 隔开
WarningInformation.Hint_CfgOLED: 请检查您的PGM是否为带屏版,带屏版才可配置此选项!
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidFileName: 提示: 文件名必须符合ASCII码规则!
WarningInformation.Hint_MCUSelection: 请搜索或选择对应的芯片型号
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidNumber: 请输出有效的数字，范围0x(00-FF).
WarningInformation.Hint_DefaultNumber: 写保护字为默认值0xFFFFFFFF,所需修改请点击“选项字节设置”.
WarningInformation.Hint_CopyFile: 拷贝文件中，请不要拔掉工具或断电!!
WarningInformation.Hint_Disorder: 当前设置数据加密值为
WarningInformation.Hint_OTPADDR: 输入地址为OTP区域，是否需要锁存？

Text.Start: Welcome to the Programmer Config Tool

ErrorInformation.URLError: File URL error or file protected!
ErrorInformation.Error_Customized: Customized parameters do not conform to the format!
ErrorInformation.Error_InvalidFileName: The file name does not comply with Windows naming rules. Please re-enter!
ErrorInformation.Error_FileNameLength: The file name length exceeds the range of 25 characters or less.
ErrorInformation.Error_InvalidNumber: The data is invalid. Please enter a number in the correct format (00-FF).
ErrorInformation.Error_KeyErr: Error in key conversion, please re-enter!
ErrorInformation.Error_OTPErr: OTP start address error！It should start from the block start address.

WarningInformation.CancelMCUEncryption: If cancel the MCU Flash lock, may lead to be encrypted files were obtained from the MCU Flash, whether to continue to cancel MCU Flash lock?
WarningInformation.Hint_FileName: Please enter a custom file name.
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidKeyLength: The length of the key should be: 2 - 16
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidKey: The key format can only be ASCII！
WarningInformation.Hint_CfgOLED: Please check if your PGM is a screen version, which can only be configured with this option!
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidFileName: The file name must comply with ASCII code rules!
WarningInformation.Hint_MCUSelection: Please search or select the corresponding chip model!
WarningInformation.Hint_ValidNumber: Please output a valid number, range 0x(00-FF).
WarningInformation.Hint_DefaultNumber: The write protected word is set to the default value of 0xFFFFFFFF. To modify it, please click on "Option Byte Settings".
WarningInformation.Hint_CopyFile: Please do not unplug the tool or power off while copying the file!!
WarningInformation.Hint_Disorder: The current data encryption value is
WarningInformation.Hint_OTPADDR: The input address is in the OTP range. Is it required to be locked?
